textBox.richText: And I’m a Registered Republican....as of today. I KNOW I KNOW, from everyone that knows me I have not gone crazy. and please don’t IM me “we're not friends anymore - 9 years down the drain in an instant!” There is a method to this madness. I did this to vote for Ron Paul for the NY Republican Primary. This is hopefully my small step, along with a monetary contribution, to make Dr. Paul, the Republican Candidate. If he does become the Candidate, I will vote for him for president. His record is a mirror image of what he preaches, unlike every single other candidate on their soapboxes made of money from lobbyists.
